attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review: I DOWNLOADED THIS APP BECAUSE DONALD MAILED ME A LETTER SAYING THAT IF I DOWNLOADED THIS APP AND BOUGHT $18377483 WORTH OF HIS MERCH THAT DYLAN OBRIEN WOULD MARRY ME. OBVIOUSLY I DID IT. ITS BEEN 2 YEARS, DONALD. TWO YEARS!!!!! I AM NOW IN SEVERE DEBT WITH ONLY MOUNTAINS OF DONALD TRUMP MERCH LEFT TO MY NAME AND DYLAN OBRIEN NEVER MARRIED ME! IN FACT HE CAME TO MY DOOR ONE NIGHT WITH MATTHEW GRAY GULBER AND LITERALLY STOLE MY PANTS AND STARTED JUMPING AROUND LIKE MONKEYS! WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! AND ON TOP OF IT ALL I AM NOW UNEMPLOYED DURING CORONA WITH NO HEALTH INSURANCE OR STIMULUS CHECK AND I CANT HELP BUT THINK ITS BECAUSE OF THIS STUPID APP!
